Lists can be nested in Markdown:

* Here it is.
* Don’t do evil.
** Cats are good.
** Dogs are bad.
* [http://www.google.com Link] in Markdown is simple. Check http://www.google.com.

Markdown has simple syntax to support code display, with inline style <code>rm -rf /</code> or in separate section as follows:

<pre>SSH Port: 22
Username: YOUR_USERNAME
Password: YOUR_PASSWORD
Home: /lustre/home/YOUR_HOME</pre>
Code can be nested in to the list too:

<ol style="list-style-type: decimal;">
<li><p>Delete Windows:</p>
<pre>format c</pre></li>
<li><p>Install Linux:</p>
<pre>$ uanme -a</pre></li></ol>
